patterns.component_pattern: React functional components with TypeScript, using MUI (Material-UI) styled components
patterns.empty_state_usage: EmptyState component accepts variant, title, description, icon, action, and secondaryAction props for rich empty states
patterns.backward_compatibility: Keep existing emptyMessage prop for backward compatibility, while adding new emptyState* props for enhanced functionality

existing_implementations.description: EmptyState.tsx is a well-designed component with 5 variants (empty, no-results, error, no-data, not-found), icons, styled container, and optional action buttons. MaterialsPage.tsx already uses EmptyState but externally (lines 361-375) by checking filteredMaterials.length === 0 before rendering DataTable.
key_insights: DataTable currently has plain-text empty state at lines 162-169 using Box and Typography
EmptyState component provides IconContainer (80x80px circle), title (h6), description (body2), and optional action buttons
MaterialsPage shows the desired pattern but implemented externally - we should move this logic INTO DataTable
DataTable is used in 5 pages: RFIPage, MaterialsPage, EquipmentPage, InspectionsPage, AuditLogPage
Current emptyMessage prop usage: 'No equipment found', 'No materials found' - these should become default titles

ui_consistency.description: This task improves visual consistency by replacing sparse plain-text empty states with polished EmptyState components across all table views
benefits: Consistent empty state design across all DataTable usages
Better user guidance with contextual CTAs (e.g., 'Add Equipment', 'Create Contact')
Improved visual hierarchy with icons and structured content
Enhanced user experience with actionable empty states
